Package backend.trip

Class TripDataAccess

java.lang.Object
backend.database.DataAccess
backend.trip.TripDataAccess
public class TripDataAccess extends DataAccess
Database helper class for accessing trips.

  • Method Details

    • searchTripsBetween

      public List<Trip> searchTripsBetween​(String from, String to, String date) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Find all trips that have the same to, from, date.
      Parameters:
      from - Area to travel from.
      to - Area to travel to.
      date - Date in html 5 standard format (yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm).
      Returns:
      List of trips.
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - If .get() on a future fails.
      InterruptedException - If there is concurrency problem with the database.

    • findSpecificTrip

      public Trip findSpecificTrip​(@Nonnull String documentId) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Get trip from the id.
      Parameters:
      documentId - The document id of the trip.
      Returns:
      The trip we found, null if trip was not found.
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - If .get() on a future fails.
      InterruptedException - If there is concurrency problem with the database.

    • getMatchingTrip

      public Trip getMatchingTrip​(String from, String to, String date) throws NoSuchElementException, ExecutionException, InterruptedException, IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Find a matching trip where to and from is the same and date is the same but time differs 30 minutes.
      Parameters:
      from - Destination to travel from.
      to - Destionation to travel to.
      date - Date html 5 standard.
      Returns:
      Document reference of the trip that was matched.
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - If .get() on a future fails.
      InterruptedException - If there is concurrency problem with the database.
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - If date was wrongly formatted.
      NoSuchElementException

    • acceptTrip

      public boolean acceptTrip​(@Nonnull String tripId, String passengerId) throws NoSuchElementException, ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Accept an offer trip. Makes the relevant database updates such as adding the passenger to the corresponding trip.
      Returns:
      true if successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - If .get() on a future fails.
      InterruptedException - If there is concurrency problem with the database.
      NoSuchElementException
